name: Alan Trefler
text: A big thank you to our 2019 @pega summer interns, you brought tremendous energy and value to the company. A special congratulations to The Bobble Bunch for winning our intern presentation competition. Great ideas come from everywhere. #PegaInterns #LifeAtPega//t.co/gESQkVTuWC

name: Alan Trefler
text: @mims These types of legacy systems can be wrapped with a model-driven, low-code architecture that keeps their usability nimble and built for the future. It's what we do at @Pega.

name: Alan Trefler
text: And that's a wrap on another outstanding #PegaWorld. Thanks to the entire extended Pega community for making our vision a reality. See you in Boston!//t.co/08U0J8zBuX

name: Alan Trefler
text: Thank you to all our clients and partners for sharing their stories of digital transformation at #PegaWorld. The keynotes, sessions, and Tech Pavilion have been inspiring.

name: Alan Trefler
text: Incredible Day 2 keynotes at #PegaWorld. A big thanks to Vaishal Gariwala of @ING_news, Robert Skinner of @FordDirect, and Jeanne Ross of @MIT_CISR for bringing your insights and stories to life.

name: Alan Trefler
text: One of my favorite parts of PegaWorld is the Tech Pavilion. It's amazing seeing such powerful technology in one place. #PegaWorld

name: Alan Trefler
text: Congratulations to the 2019 #DXHeroes! Read all about them here://t.co/E7E52sEmUd

name: Alan Trefler
text: The best part of #PegaWorld is hearing our amazing clients share their success stories. Thank you to Nicole Verburg of @VodafoneZiggo and Moshe Pridan of @SIRIUSXM for sharing your digital transformation stories.

name: Alan Trefler
text: We @Pega are proud to support @GirlsinTech. Thank you Adriana Gascoigne for sharing the incredible work that you and your organization do. #PegaWorld

name: Alan Trefler
text: @TamaraMcCleary @pega @ThuliumCo It was great meeting you. Have a fantastic time at #PegaWorld!

name: Alan Trefler
text: Had a great time at the welcome reception last night. Looking forward to kicking off another incredible #PegaWorld with our clients and partners.

text: Congratulations to Ivan Glinka of @PWC for a great game! A well deserved win. #PegaWorld//t.co/gH71p9HhBp

name: Alan Trefler
text: Amazing chess match against 15 players at #PegaWorld. Congratulations to John Ngujen from @Jabil a well earned win! Rematch next year.

text: Kicking off the chess tournament. #PegaWorld attendees, you can join me in the conference center or tune in on Facebook Live//t.co/0ZbwNntFge.//t.co/KabXcsXpm6

name: Alan Trefler
text: Each year I think may be the last, but I can't stay away. Kicking off 15 simultaneous #PegaWorld chess matches at 2 pm. Come by and say hi.
